ingredients.content: 200 g red peppers, cut in eighths (approx. 2 peppers)
120 g red onions, cut in pieces (3 cm)
100 g celery, cut in pieces (1 cm)
1 tsp fine sea salt, or to taste
¼ tsp ground black pepper, or to taste
10 fresh basil leaves, or to taste

preparations.content: Place oil in mixing bowl and heat <b>3 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Add aubergines, red peppers, onions, celery and garlic then sauté <b>10 min/110°C//speed 0.5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add tomatoes, capers, olives, passata, vinegar and sugar then simmer <b>10 min/98°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Season to taste with salt and pepper then add fresh basil and stir in with spatula. Serve warm, at room temperature or chilled.
